name: Dr. Sarah Khan
about_me: Dedicated dental professional with over 15 years of experience in family and cosmetic dentistry. Passionate about patient education and preventative care with a commitment to excellence and community service.

awards.title: Humanitarian Award
awards.description: Recognized for providing free dental care to underserved communities in rural areas.

awards.title: Certificate for International Volunteer Service
awards.description: Awarded for volunteering dental services in international health missions.

awards.title: Dental Professional of The Year Award
awards.description: Honored for outstanding contributions in clinical excellence and patient care.
